name: Asteroid Farmer (Wouter Buckens)
description:
Asteroid Farmer

Some time, somewhere in the future. Mankind has mastered space travel and zero-gravity carrot farming. You set out to become a carrot farmer on a free asteroid, under the watchful eye of the Outer Space Authority. But things aren't as peaceful as they seem...

Entry for the 34th Godot Wild game jam.

Asteroid Farmer is a mix of tower defense and resource management. Your objective is to grow carrots on your asteroid farm to use as ammunition to fight off space invaders.

How to play

The game is entirely controlled with the mouse. Follow the in-game story instructions to learn how the game works.
